intro: Arrr you ready for more puzzlin', plunderin' and perilous tentacles?
description:
Aye, captain! The seven seas still hide secrets — and no one’s better suited to uncover them than you! In Pirate Trails 2: Tentacles & Treasures, the most beloved pirate puzzle on the high seas is back with new maps, new dangers... and a lot more tentacles!

Embark on a tropical journey where your ship must follow perfect routes through a sea of hexagons. But beware! The Kraken is watching, and its tentacles block the way to the most valuable treasures. Only gunpowder can stop your ship from becoming sushi!

Collect powder kegs, trace clever paths, gather golden treasures, and lead your ship to the final port — without becoming calamari.

Explore 30 handcrafted levels across three unique biomes:

Tortuga – Where it all begins (and where the tentacles are still shy).
Port Royal – Routes multiply, and the tentacles grow fiercer.
Nassau – The ultimate challenge, where every powder keg counts and a single wrong turn could spell victory... or shipwreck.

You don’t control the ship — you control its fate. Rotate, swap, and place puzzle tiles wisely. When the route is ready, press the button and watch the ship sail through your brilliant strategy.
